english.title: Tunisian Hadrah
text: O, My Lord! Send salutations and greetings forever
Upon Your beloved, who is the best of all creations.
O, My Lord! Send salutations and greetings forever
Upon Your beloved, who is the best of all creations.
Most noble of all creations, I have none
save you with whom to refuge seek,
Most noble of all creations, I have none
save you with whom to refuge seek,
Most noble of all creations, I have none
save you with whom to refuge seek,
.. the Day of Doom doth loom.
O, My Lord! Send salutations and greetings forever
Upon Your beloved, who is the best of all creations.
Oh, Prophet of God, may your honour great
Oh, Prophet of God, may your honour great
Oh, Prophet of God, may your honour great
When bounteous God, just punishment on sinners..
O, My Lord! Send salutations and greetings forever
Upon Your beloved, who is the best of all creations.
O, My Lord! Send salutations and greetings forever
Upon Your beloved, who is the best of all creations.

arabic.title: داري (النسخة المختصرة)
text: داري... داري يا قلبي مهما تداري
واهو عادي محدش في الدنيا دي

english.title: Hide
text: For so long we haven't seen you.ٍ is there something wrong?
Your heart has been astray for a long time
Why are you afraid to talk?
In your eyes lie confusion and a lot of stories
You have changed deeply from how you used to be:
had loved, and then leaved places that are still living inside you
With every passing day your sense declines,
You step forward; but your steps stumble,
you lose passion as they frustrate you
and when can you find a cure for that?
With every passing day you farewell a new dream,
you fell surrounded by your worries.
But all of this is incomparable to the pain of expatriation
You never give anything any attention
Hide... hide, My heart, as much as you can
In front of others our sorrow is, nevertheless, uncovered
It is normal: every one in this life
must be separated from what he loves the most.

arabic.title: (داري يا قلبي (جيتار
text: داري داري ... يا قلبي مهما تداري
وأهو عادي عادي ... ماحدش في الدنيا دي
بيتعلق بشيء إلا و فُراقه يشوف
كل اللي معاك في الصورة غاب
وداري داري ... يا قلبي مهما تداري
وأهو عادي عادي ... ماحدش في الدنيا دي
بيتعلق بشيء إلا و فُراقه يشوف
وف ليلة سرحت في اللي راح

english.title: Conceal it (Acoustic Version)
text: What't wrong? Why have you disappeared?
For so long your heart has been in a loss
Why do you fear to talk?
There are confusion and many stories showing in your eyes
(You are) so different from whom you used to be;
(You are) locking up your heart behind shut doors;
(You) Loved, and (then) departed many a place,
that is still living in you
With every day your sensation degrades.
You step, and your step stumbles.
They frustrate you a lot that you lose passion to life.
Where is the cure for that?
Every day you bid farewell to a dream,
But that's all can not be compared with the (pain of) expatriation.
You pay no attention to anything
"Scarcely talking" became a feature of you
Conceal it, My heart. (As much as you can) conceal it
Our sorrow (will remain) uncovered to others (no matter what)
It's normal, quite normal: Everybody in this life
loves anything must part from it.
All those is the photo are now absent:
Your homeland, your kin, and your friend.
In your eyes I can see a look of longing
Many are those, to whom you long
With every tick of the clock
We had raised our hopes too high
that we forgot how to live.
It was written for us to take this path
parting, from time to time, from a thing (of what we love).
Conceal it, My heart. (As much as you can) conceal it
Our sorrow (will remain) uncovered to others (no matter what)
It's normal, quite normal: Everybody in this life
loves anything must part from it.
But one night, while you was abstracted in your memories,
your eyes watered and your wounds were reopened.
Many has happened in this life

english.title: Any Words
text: I wish you've never asked again
And I live in torment with it 2
And I reply by any words
ِAnd I leave them & walk away so
I won't hear their question again
And you world, what happened to you?
And why is my heart suffering?
Inside us the sorrows of (many) years
Inside our eyes a laugh, but
With us thinking in what passed
Is it true that time has gone so far,
And you world, tell the truth
Are we short in doing something,
Or did we do what we were supposed to do?
And I reply by any words
ِAnd I leave them & walk away so
I won't hear their question again
And I go back to dreaming & living
Whether I get what I want or not
Am not getting but what I'm destined to get
After a tear there's always a good deal
coming to you, but only on its time
Be patient, your God is great
And you world, tell the truth
Are we short in doing something,
Or did we do what we were supposed to do?
And I reply by any words
ِAnd I leave them & walk away so
I won't hear their question again

arabic.title: أيوب وناعسة
text: ياما جرى لايوب على حكم الزمن
ولا يوم شكت أبداً ولا الخالِ درى
أول سنة يا ايوب ما قولنا بتنقضي..
تالت سنة يا ايوب بقيت مُضني وعليل
لا حيلة ع العرض السليم م المعيرة
رابع سنة يا ايوب جفوك ناس البلد
قالوا خديه ده وامشي به يا غندرة
تقول لهم يا لايمين قلّوا الملام
من باع لحمه يا ناس يصير به معيرة
تقول لهم يا لايمين قلّوا الملام
مشيت نهار وتاني نهار وتالت نهار
تشيل بعينها تلاقي عشة في الجبل
ناعسة سابت أيوب وطلعت ع البلد

english.title: Job and Na'saa
text: Job suffered much from the verdicts of fate.
And his wife endured these scourges.
His wife was of a noble lineage.
She had never complained to anybody. Even close kin didn't know anything.
Oh, Job! We thought it all to finish in the first year.
In the second year she kept enduring your misery.
In the third year, O, Job, you became so exhausted and ill.
The noble honor is not proof against schadenfreude.
In the forth year you have been let down by the folk of your town.
They said: "Take him and go away, dearest!".
She said: "O, you haters! There is no need for bashing.
How can one escape from shame if he bought1 his own flesh?"
She said: "O, you haters! There is no need for bashing.
and we will be leaving in the morning"
She walked for a day, for two, for three,
For four days, enduring hunger. But Na'saa was patient.
Raising her eyes upwards, she saw a hut on the mountain.
In front of which was a spring of pure, sweet water.
Na'saa left Job there and headed toward the town.
And now she is about to go begging

arabic.title: إنسان
text: يا ما نفسي أعيش إنسان قلبه على كفه
كل اللي بردانين ف كفوفه يتدفوا
اللي معاه على طول مش ليه

english.title: Human
text: Oh how I wish to live like a human being who carries his heart in his hand
All those feeling cold would find warmth in the palms of his hands
When he laughs all of God’s creation laughs
When he’s happy he makes everyone else happy
A human being inside you and me
A human being who has a dream and an aim
He’s always giving away everything he has
And he doesn’t even own his own spirit
Inside his heart and in the depths of his eyes
He carries hope, sunrise and life
A human being who loves and never hates
A human being who has hope for a better tomorrow
He appears in the midst of hardship and reassures others
Never has he betrayed nor will he ever accuse anyone of treason

arabic.title: إوعدوني
text: اللي انتهاله ناس كتير ألقاه أنا
في الدنيا ليه دايماً نهاية محزنة
زوروني مرّة كل عيد أشوفكو حتى من بعيد
الناس تغيب بس انتو لازم تفضلوا

english.title: Promise Me
text: I've been out and about; I've feared that
I would find the same fate that many people ended up with
Why is it that the ending is always sad in this world?
Inside me there's a fear of the word "circumstances"
[A fear of them] becoming our way to a loneliness that would humiliate us
Promise me that you1will remain by my side, reassuring me
Promise me no matter what happens that you won't leave me
The day I leave, and life hides me
Visit me once every feast so I can see you even from a distance
If I find one day that I have bowed
And became in need because of my weakness, please don't be late [to help]
People go remain distant but you must stay
I am scared of being alone in the world,
of my life becoming worthless, of getting lost while you are far away

arabic.title: اسمعني
text: وإن جيلنا ده كله شوية عيال
اسمعني.. انت اللي بتضيعني.. للماضي بترجعني
أحلامي.. انت اللي قضيت عليها.. لما اتحكمت فيها
احنا جيل اللي شايب وهو شباب
كل حلم بألم كل خطوة بعذاب
شيلنا هم الحياة دوقنا مرّ السنين
لا.. مش هبقى نسخة من ماضيك
ليه أبقى زيك تمام.. أهو عايش والسلام
لا.. أنا هختار الطريق.. وهعاند كل شيء
أحلامي.. انت اللي قضيت عليها.. لما اتحكمت فيها

english.title: Listen to me
text: my life has never been by my choice
against my will, you're forcing me and making decisions for me
you treat me like i'm just a shadow
and that our generation are just some kids
Listen to me! .. you're the one who's making me lose everything  .. and taking me back to the past that you want to imprison me in it.
My dreams! .. you are the one who destroyed it when you controlled it, so what's left for me
we are the generation who hair-grayed while in their youths
every dream with pain, every step with torture
we've carried the burden of life, tasted the bitterness of the years
and also they want us to live humiliated
no! .. i will tell you one word
no! .. i won't be a clone of your past
why should i be a carbon copy of you .. just barley alive
no .. i will choose my way .. and resist everything
My dreams .. you are the one who destroyed it when you controlled it, so what's left for me?

arabic.title: الصينية
text: يا ليل يا ليلي يا ليل يا عيني يا ليل
فين اللي يجمعوا عليك أهل النية
فين الكساب تجيك رايحة وقت عشية

english.title: Tea plate
text: Oh night , my night , my eyes
Where are those who get good people around you
Where are the generous and  blessed ones
And I'm gone and I'm taken with rhymes
And my beloved ones don't want to lose me
But I'm sinking in the sea of music
And I'm gone and I'm taken with rhymes
And my beloved ones don't want to lose me
But I'm sinking in the sea of music
If you don't see me , just pray for me
If you don't see me , just pray for me
And I'm gone and I'm taken with rhymes
And my beloved ones don't want to lose me
But I'm sinking in the sea of music
Where are the girls that comes with dress and flowers
Where the shepherd , watching her coming back home in the evening
Where are the girls that comes with dress and flowers
Where the shepherd , watching her coming back home in the evening
And I'm gone and I'm taken with rhymes
And my beloved ones don't want to lose me
But I'm sinking in the sea of music
And I'm gone and I'm taken with rhymes
And my beloved ones don't want to lose me
But I'm sinking in the sea of music
And I'm gone and I'm taken with rhymes
And my beloved ones don't want to lose me
But I'm sinking in the sea of music

arabic.title: القطر
text: بين البشر تاهيين.. من كل كاس شاربين
مع إننا بنموت.. لكن تقول عايشين
ما بتستناش يا قطر..اللي ما جاش يا قطر
ولا فيك مكان.. يركب حدّ ببلاش
واهو فات معاك العُمر.. سِكّتنا خير أو شر
ما بتستناش يا قطر..اللي ما جاش يا قطر
ولا فيك مكان.. يركب حدّ ببلاش
واهو فات معاك العُمر.. سِكّتنا خير أو شر
قصّر يا قطر أوام.. ما تعدّي يا أيام
ده انا عمري راح في طريق
بين البشر تاهيين.. من كل كاس شاربين
مع إننا بنموت.. لكن تقول عايشين
ما بتستناش يا قطر..اللي ما جاش يا قطر
ولا فيك مكان.. يركب حدّ ببلاش
واهو فات معاك العُمر.. سِكّتنا خير أو شر
ما بتستناش يا قطر..اللي ما جاش يا قطر
ولا فيك مكان.. يركب حدّ ببلاش
واهو فات معاك العُمر.. سِكّتنا خير أو شر
يا قلبي ليه.. محتار ومش شايف
واخترنا ليه.. نمشي ف طريق لافف؟
بص بعينيك قدام.. في العُمر فاضل كام
علشان تسيبُه يضيع.. في رحلة الأوهام
ما بتستناش يا قطر..اللي ما جاش يا قطر
ولا فيك مكان.. يركب حدّ ببلاش
واهو فات معاك العُمر.. سِكّتنا خير أو شر

english.title: Train
text: I took a ride with you and it changed me;
That day I paid a high price.
We wander lost amongst people, drinking from every cup.
Although we are dying, we appear as though we are alive and well.
O Train, you never wait for those who are running late,
And you don't have a spot for anyone to ride for free;
Our life has gone with you, for better or worse;
Where are we heading? Don’t tell us, I beg of you…
O Train, you never wait for those who are running late,
And you don't have a spot for anyone to ride for free;
Our life has gone with you, for better or worse;
Where will we end up? Don’t tell us, I beg of you…
Hurry up, Train! Days, pass by!
My life was spent on a path...
We wander lost amongst people, drinking from every cup.
Although we are dying, we appear as though we are alive and well.
O Train, you never wait for those who are running late,
And you don't have a spot for anyone to ride for free;
Our life has gone with you, for better or worse;
Where are we heading? Don’t tell us, I beg of you…
O Train, you never wait for those who are running late,
And you don't have a spot for anyone to ride for free;
Our life has gone with you, for better or worse;
Where will we end up? Don’t tell us, I beg of you…
My heart, why are you so confused and unable to see?
How I’ve lost so many years because you were fearful,
The whole way I was lying to myself.
Why have chosen to keep going in circles?
Look straight ahead, see how much of your life remains...
To be wasted in a journey of illusions.
And you don't have a spot...
Our life has gone with you…
Where will we end up? … Don’t tell us…
And you don't have a spot for anyone to ride for free;
Our life has gone with you, for better or worse;
Where will we end up? Don’t tell us, I beg of you…

arabic.title: الواد العبيط
text: أنا اللي قولتوا عليه ساذج وطيب

english.title: The Idiotic Kid
text: I am the one you called naive and [too] kind
But you'll soon say he has changed
He started thinking of his own interests
He saw his wounds.. and woke up
he used to be kind, but he died
this is all in the past, good riddance to it
He saw the lies of the faces [around him]
the truth became apparent to him
He became aware of some worthless people
he used to be kind, but he died
My story with you is over
No.. this all is in the past
All the past was a mistake
my heart is sick of servility
And you don't have a place in it
he used to be kind, but he died
I am leaving and I don't forgive you
And I forgot all the past
because you are in my story
And when I forgot you, my life
became a true life once again

arabic.title: الوشوش
text: اللي يدوس على ناسه ف ثانية ويتغير
بعد ما بان على أصله لسه بيتصور
يرجع يلاقي فرحتنا بيه… مش سابعانا
لا بنقول له معلش بقى وكان على عيّنا
كان نفسنّا فعلاً نلقا له… مكان بينّا
لازم يفهم جداً إنه… إنه اللي يسيبنا
ما يجيش وقت ما يبقى بيغرق… يعمل حبيبنا
اللي فضل يتمسكن ياما وياما لحد ما طال
شايفه ينفع يبقى ممثل هايل مش بطال
ساعة معانا وساعة تانية يبقى معاهم
كل شوية يغير شكله… مش راسي على حال
اتطمن يا حبيبي اتطمن كلنا فاهمين
يالله بقى اخلع الله يحنن… ما حناء عايزين
الكداب بيبان لو مهما… طال المطال

english.title: Faces
text: Hypocritical faces have increased among us
We don’t believe you any more
Those who take back their promises are low (despicable)
Those who step on others’ feelings and change
We will still welcome them with open arms
No, we will tell them “Sorry, better luck next time!”
We sincerely wanted to find a place for them among us
They have to clearly understand that whoever leaves us
Can’t expect our help when in need
Hypocritical faces have increased among us
We don’t believe you any more
Those who kept acting til they got what they wanted
They can be extraordinary actors, for real!
One hour on our side, the next against us
Changing their masks everynow and then
Rest assured, we all understand what you’re doing
Time for you to leave, we don’t need you anymore
We refuse to have you around, yes, call us crazy!
Liars get caught in the end, even if it takes a long time
Hypocritical faces have increased among us
We don’t believe you any more

arabic.title: بص بص
text: ولا مين شاف ولا مين دِري
أنا بعت هناك وهبيع من هنا
عيني عينك واللي يشوف ما يشوف
ولا فيه عند اللي جابونا كسوف

english.title: look,look
text: the shop of the happiest man ever
it is known in the shops , gentlemen
it took us back to the cheapness age
there are always some arguments about my products
open your bags and spread your goods
who said you need to buy
take my goods one by one
it is 60 pounds but u can only pay 6
or actually you don't have to pay
cuz no one will buy them
and there is no owner for them
oh these goods are so good
who will check what I'm doing
I've inherted that from my Dad
oh don't consider me as a thief
I said it has no owner
and the absent can't take it
I sold there and I'll sell here
if you can, do like me
the spring came and the weather is fine
now it doesn't matter let them see it
and that who talks will die
it took us back to the age of cheapness

arabic.title: بلدي يا بلدي
text: بلدي يا بلدي وانا نفسي أروح بلدي
بلدي يا بلدي وانا نفسي أروح بلدي
بلدي يا بلدي وانا نفسي أروح بلدي
بلدي يا بلدي وانا نفسي أروح بلدي
بلدي يا بلدي وانا نفسي أروح بلدي
بلدي يا بلدي وانا نفسي أروح بلدي
بلدي يا بلدي وانا نفسي أروح بلدي
بلدي يا بلدي وانا نفسي أروح بلدي
بلدي يا بلدي وانا نفسي أروح بلدي
بلدي يا بلدي وانا نفسي أروح بلدي
بلدي يا بلدي وانا نفسي أروح بلدي
بلدي يا بلدي وانا نفسي أروح بلدي
بلدي يا بلدي وانا نفسي أروح بلدي
بلدي يا بلدي وانا نفسي أروح بلدي
بلدي يا بلدي وخلاص روحت بلدي
بلدي يا بلدي وخلاص روحت بلدي
بلدي يا بلدي وخلاص روحت بلدي
بلدي يا بلدي وخلاص روحت بلدي

english.title: Homeland ..O Homeland!
text: Homeland ..O Homeland! Take me back  to my homeland
Homeland ..O Homeland! Take me back  to my homeland
The land of the Turquoise1 in my country
Homeland .. O Homeland! Take me back  to my homeland
Homeland .. O Homeland! Take me back  to my homeland
It's the city of "Al Sayyed Al Badawy"2
Homeland .. O Homeland! Take me back  to my homeland
Homeland .. O Homeland! Take me back  to my homeland
And what can one say about the Upper Egyptians?!
With their generosity and overflowing love
And their hearts that are like burning candles
Homeland .. O Homeland! Take me back  to my homeland
Homeland .. O Homeland! Take me back  to my homeland
And the sea willingly gives him its fish
Homeland .. O Homeland! Take me back  to my homeland
Homeland .. O Homeland! Take me back  to my homeland
Al Azhar, Al Hussein, & the Opera3
It surely deserves to be named "the Great"4
Homeland .. O Homeland! Take me back  to my homeland
Homeland .. O Homeland! Take me back  to my homeland
Your status is known in this universe
And if your son dies for your sake
Homeland .. O Homeland! Take me back  to my homeland
Homeland .. O Homeland! Take me back  to my homeland
Homeland .. O Homeland. I'm finally back to my homeland!
Homeland .. O Homeland. I'm finally back to my homeland!
Homeland .. O Homeland. I'm finally back to my homeland!
Homeland .. O Homeland. I'm finally back to my homeland!

english.title: My country, O my country
text: My country, O my country .. Oh how much I would love to go back to my country
Days are running away from us but we've never forgotten for a day
The blood of the heros in Sinai, the land of Turquoise, in my country

arabic.title: تسمحي
text: تسمحي لي يامّه من وقتك شوية؟
أنسى جنبك حِمل شايله تقيل عليا
كل يوم بقى يشبه اليوم اللي عدّى
كلمتين مش مفهومين على دمعة شاردة
خوفي لا تطوّل علينا الشِّدة ديّه
ما دريتيش يامّه اللي حاصل وانتي غايبه؟
حالنا مال بعدك خلاص الدنيا سايبه
قبل ما امشي باسألِك.. مش عايزة حاجة؟
لسه برضه ساكتة مش هتقولي حاجة؟

english.title: Can you spare me
text: Mother, can you spare a moment?
I want to forget by your side my heavy burden
Listen to me as you always do
Bear with me, if I cry
Mother, the world's harshness has become too much for me
Mother, the world's harshness has become too much for me
Every day is like the one before it
A few incoherent words mixed with a lonely tear
Even the colour of the world has become so pale and lifeless
Any sense of purpose in my heart is lost
And I fear that things will only get worse
And I fear that things will only get worse
Mother, don't you know what happened when you were away?
After you, our situation has become so bad, and our world has turned into chaos
Have you seen how even these scumbags...
Have now come out of their holes and become respectable and held in high regard?
The cowards have seized the oppurtunity to beat me
The cowards have seized the oppurtunity to beat me
Before I leave, I wanted to ask if you need anything?
Why are you still silent, won't you say anything?
Tomorrow you will be well again
You who carried so many burdens for so long
I pray you come back to us, Mother, like the old days, strong and splendid
I pray you come back to us, Mother, like the old days, strong and splendid
I pray you come back to us, Mother, like the old days, strong and splendid

english.title: Allow me
text: Mother,Allow me to take from your time a little!?
i want to forget my heavy burden by your side
And you always listening to me as always you do
if i cried, bear with me
Mother, the world's cruelty become so much on me
Everyday is like the one before it
A few ununderstandable words with a lonely tear
Even the color of life has become so pale
And the meanings have lost in my heart
My fear if things getting much worse
Mother, don't you know what happened when you are absent
After you, our situation has become worse and the world is in chaos
Have you seen how even these scumbags
Now come out of the holes and become respectful and valuable
The cowards have found a chance to beat me
Before i leave i'm asking you, don't you need anything?
You are still silent, Won't you say something?
You who carried the burden for so long
May you come back to us, mother, like the old days always glory
May you come back to us, mother, like the old days always glory

arabic.title: حاصر حصارك
text: اكيد نهارك يملا قلب الضلمه ضي
اكيد نهارك يملا قلب الضلمه ضي
اكيد نهارك يملا قلب الضلمه ضي
اكيد نهارك يملا قلب الضلمه ضي
اكيد نهارك يملا قلب الضلمه ضي
اكيد نهارك يملا قلب الضلمه ضي
طول ما انت فيك النبض حي
طول ما انت فيك النبض حي
طول ما انت فيك النبض حي
طول ما انت فيك النبض حي

english.title: Besiege your siege
text: Your day will surely lighten up the darkness
Your day will surely lighten up the darkness
Draw with your heart the lines of your destiny
The jailer will become your prisoner
Draw with your heart the lines of your destiny
The jailer will become your prisoner
Your day will surely lighten up the darkness
Your day will surely lighten up the darkness
Your day will surely lighten up the darkness
And our humiliation when we bowed down
And how we easily sold you out
And our humiliation when we bowed down
And how we easily sold you out
Your day will surely lighten up the darkness
As long as you have a live pulse
As long as you have a live pulse
As long as you have a live pulse
As long as you have a live pulse

arabic.title: حكاية طفل
text: كان طفل صغير لكن كنت  تشوفه تقول
ليه سابق سِنُّه وليه محتار البال على طول
كان نفسه حكاية في غنوة تخلي الحب يعود

english.title: A child's tale
text: He was just a child but from a glance you’d wonder why
Why is he burdened, confused and always troubled..
He hoped a tale from a song can resonate love back,
Love will be back, It has to come back..
And I grew up to see
My dreams intertwine with my days,
They are now filled with goodness and peace

arabic.title: دار يا دار
text: يا دار قولي لي يا دار
يا دار قولي لي يا دار
يا دار قولي لي يا دار
يا دار قولي لي يا دار
يا دار قولي لي يا دار

english.title: Home, O home.
text: O Home, tell me, O Home.
O Home, tell me, O Home.
O Home, tell me, O Home.
Where have they gone, the beloved people of Home.
When morning came, it became an abandoned emptiness
When morning came, it became an abandoned emptiness
Where have they gone, the beloved people of Home.
Don't make these (grey) clouds any bigger!
There is a god named the Generous,
in the time of adversity, a protector.
There is a god named the Generous,
in the time of adversity, a protector.
Where have they gone, the beloved people of Home.
O Home, tell me, O Home.
O Home, tell me, O Home.
Where have they gone, the beloved people of Home.
Where have they gone, the beloved people of Home.

arabic.title: داري يا قلبي
text: داري داري يا قلبي مهما تداري
واهو عادي عادي، ماحدش ف الدنيا دي
كل اللي معاك في الصورة غاب
داري داري يا قلبي مهما تداري
واهو عادي عادي، ماحدش ف الدنيا دي

english.title: Conceal it
text: What't wrong? Why have you disappeared?
For so long your heart has been in a loss
Why do you fear to talk?
There are confusion and many stories showing in your eyes
(You are) so different from whom you used to be;
(You are) locking up your heart behind shut doors;
(You) Loved, and (then) departed many a place,
that is still living in you
With every day your sensation degrades.
You step, and your step stumbles.
They frustrate you a lot that you lose passion to life.
Where is the cure for that?
Every day you bid farewell to a dream,
But that's all can not be compared with the (pain of) expatriation.
You pay no attention to anything
"Scarcely talking" became a feature of you
Conceal it, My heart. (As much as you can) conceal it
Our sorrow (will remain) uncovered to others (no matter what)
It's normal, quite normal: Everybody in this life
loves anything must part from it.
All those is the photo are now absent:
Your homeland, your kin, and your friend.
In your eyes I can see a look of longing
Many are those, to whom you long
With every tick of the clock
We had raised our hopes too high
that we forgot how to live.
It was written for us to take this path
parting, from time to time, from a thing (of what we love).
Conceal it, My heart. (As much as you can) conceal it
Our sorrow (will remain) uncovered to others (no matter what)
It's normal, quite normal: Everybody in this life
loves anything must part from it.

english.title: Shield Oh my heart
text: What's the matter, why have you faded so?
Your heart had been astray away for oh so long
Why are you so afraid to talk?
In your eyes bewilderment hides and oh so many tales
You've changed so much from before
You've shut your heart off every door
You've loved and parted so many places
Each day you feel a little less
You try and tread but with each footstep demeaed
From how they've humiliated you, you tire
But where do you find solace?
Everyday you bid farewell to another dream
The anguish plagues you all around
You don't pay anything any mind
Shield shield oh my poor heart how you can shield
Your pain is still plain for the world to see
But it is normal normal that you cannot be attached in this world to anything
Everyone with you in your photopraphs is now absent
Your homeland, your family and friends
How many bid farewell to part
I can see a look of longing in your eyes
How many can you long for
The years have always been on the move
And people are but mere passengers
With every tick tock of the clock
The memories that dwell in our hearts die
We long promised oursselves of what has passed
It was destined we tread the path
And to part in its midst, little by little, a little
We were slowly robbed of our life
Shield shield oh my poor heart how you can shield
Your pain is still plain for the world to see
But it is normal normal that you cannot be attached in this world to anything

arabic.title: دوري
text: وقولي له محال الحال يدوم لو هو إيه
ده العمر حساب في كتاب يشوف مكتوب له إيه

english.title: O Life
text: And the results are on balance
He, who thinks he is superior
And he, who is ravening/violating others’ rights
Tomorrow comes a day, when he wakes/sobers up
In this life; as you sow, so will you reap
And he, who possesses a hand of injustice
Show him with his own eyes
And tell him that it's impossible for things to last forever the way they are
Show him with his own eyes
That one's life is a book
Let him see what is written inside
It's like a roller-coaster, with no assigned turns
He who clings on to it, dreams
When it'd become lenient and give him his turn
But until when will he rise?
He will surely fall; but where?
When he sees people above him
Having taken the days for granted, forgetting
That its hours leave him unsheltered
Show him with his own eyes
And tell him that it's impossible for things to last forever the way they are
Show him with his own eyes
That one's life is a book
Let him see what is written inside
Satisfied with what it gets and what it’s allowed
His days keep smiling and getting sweeter
Because it's sweetness of the soul
Nothing will fill the bottomless pit of his greed
Show him with his own eyes
And tell him that it's impossible for things to last forever the way they are
Show him with his own eyes
That one’s life is a book
Let him see what is written inside
Show him with his own eyes
And tell him that it's impossible for things to last forever the way they are

arabic.title: شوية حبايب
text: أيوة يا قلبي أنا عارف مالنا
طب هات كده عينك ف عينيّا
ولا دي ملامحك ولا ده إنت

english.title: Few beloved
text: Winter has become colder than before
If you saw my tears you'll forgive me
Yes my heart, I know what's with us
We lack someone to console us
Wondering if they tear for us?
Still our thoughts wondering in their absence.
Feeling that their return is possible
We lack someone to console us
Eyes intermittently looking at the photo
Something in your heart is broken
This is not your feature, nor its you!
You still don't know what it is?
We lack someone to console us
We lack someone to console us

arabic.title: شيكايو
text: بالصلاة ع النبي أنا هحكيلكم حكايتنا الأزلية
يادي الوكسة دي نفس الحادثة بتتعاد كل شوية
والسواق مبسوط وبيضحك ومافيش حتى فرامل
كل ما أقول له هنغرق ياسطى ولا سامع ولا سائل
ياللي ع الترعة حوّد ع المالح
احنا في الميّة من ليلة امبارح
سيّد يا سيّد في الخيبة نصبح ونبيّت

english.title: Sheekayyo (شيكايو)
text: We're going to die, Mr. driver !!
Starting with a prayer for the prophet I'm going to tell you our eternal story
What a crisis, the same accident repeating every now & then [x2]
I'm riding a bus with people
Crazy they are & I'm at loss among them
And we're going down a bridge on top gear
And the driver is driving into a channel
And the driver is content & laughing.. & there isn't even any brakes
Whenever I tell him we're going to drown Mr. driver, he's not listening or caring [x2]
And the passengers are divided in two
And among them we are poor/pitiful
And some people wishing the bus would catch fire
O Pasha, you have human-beings on board
Don't you have kids (to fear for) !
Mr. driver, by the life of your father,
Let me get down here please!!
While we are bubbling in the water
The story ends, my dears (dear as my eyes)
And good bye (meet you) till the next accident
You the one going on the channel take a detour to the salty (sea) 1
We've been in the water since yesterday
Sayyed, o Sayyed 1, in fiasco we start the morning & end the day
Why don't you cheer, Ms. mother of Farouk
Your son is entangled in water

arabic.title: صاحب السعادة
text: قول فضلت اجمع واحوش في الفلوس
كل ما امشي في أي حتة ابتسام
قلت أحسن لما أشوف بنت الحلال
قول نهايته رحت دافع مهر عال
يوم كتبنا ويوم دخلنا ع الزفاف
خياطتها والكمام طلعوا مش آخر موديل

english.title: Your Excellency
text: What is the meaning of happiness?
Tell me, tell me .... tell me, tell me
What is the meaning of happiness?
Tell me, tell me .... tell me, tell me
Some people told me once that for souls
So, I started collecting and saving money
Till I felt myself a Bey3
One with respect wipes my jacket,
Another one insults others for my sake,4
Another one makes a clown of himself5
Another leaves me a space to sit beside
That was all hypocrisy, all for the money
It wasn't neither of sincerity, nor of free will
There is a price for every laughter, for every smile
Tell me, Tell me ... tell me, tell me
What is the meaning of happiness?
Tell me, tell me .... tell me, tell me
I thought it better to look for my second half
Finally I paid a good dowry
For my bride, for the housewares
One day we registered the marriage, the other was the wedding day
A week later we were disappointed by the differences
While I was telling her about love, she was complaining about laundry,
About the tailor and how the sleeves look so old fashioned
All what bothers her is Sednawi6 and fashion
What is striped and what is plain
But her husband.. he doesn't matter that much
Tell me, Tell me ... tell me, tell me
Tell me, Tell me ... tell me, tell me

arabic.title: صباح الخير
text: دة اليوم شكله جميل يا ما شاء الله
كل صعب فى الدنيا ممكن يهون
كل صعب فى الدنيا ممكن يهون
كل صعب فى الدنيا ممكن يهون

english.title: Good Morning
text: We say, Good morning, and on Allah (we rely)
We're on our way and we don't care
We've had our breakfast and drank our tea
And who is it that can annoy us
Why are you so withdrawn and angry?
Don't think too much about it and let it pass
And don't give it too much thought.
Why is it every time I see you frowning?
Bro, turn to it a blind eye
And you say the world has stopped,
Why don't you just forget, dear sir, forget!
My happiness illuminates my sky no matter what.
Every difficulty in the world can melt away.
My happiness illuminates my sky no matter what.
Every difficulty in the world can melt away.
My happiness illuminates my sky no matter what.
Every difficulty in the world can melt away.

arabic.title: صوت
text: الحياه 100 الف صوت ويا بعض مشبكين
الحياه 100 الف صوت و يا بعض مشبكين
الحياه 100 الف صوت ويا بعض مشبكين
الحياه 100 الف صوت ويا بعض مشبكين

english.title: Sound
text: Life is a hundred sounds intertwined
Sounds of birds with their trees
The voice of my friend and his whisper
Telling a secret that will reside in the depth of a safe well
The sound of Adhan (islamic call for prayer) inside the mosque
And the littany rising from a classroom
Where the students recite a religious lesson (×3)
Life is a hundred sounds intertwined
When we were gathered with our friends
The yearning remains with the memory
Even our prayers in the time of need
And in our prayers when we say Amen (×2)
Life is a hundred sounds intertwined
The sound of the bell ringing at the end of the school day when we are going home (×2)
The sound of singing from the factories
Extinguishing the fires of the tired workers
The sound while kneading the dough
And the sound of the axe in the lands
However voices inside of you, even a thousand voice
Follow and see from where each is coming
Follow it, so your heart will mellow out(x2)
Always raise the voice of your concious (×4)
See the extend its echo will reach
Life is a hundred sounds intertwined

arabic.title: ضلمت كده ليه
text: هي ضلمت كده ليه.. اللي ودّاني يجيبني
يومي راح في الزحمة يا بيه.. البلد بتعذبني
هي ضلمت كده ليه.. اللي ودّاني يجيبني
يومي راح في الزحمة يا بيه.. البلد بتعذبني
وما دام يا سيدي اليوم ده خميس
هي ضلمت كده ليه.. اللي ودّاني يجيبني
يومي راح في الزحمة يا بيه.. البلد بتعذبني
ما وعيتش غير في صلاح سالم
هي ضلمت كده ليه.. اللي ودّاني يجيبني
يومي راح في الزحمة يا بيه.. البلد بتعذبني
هي ضلمت كده ليه.. اللي ودّاني يجيبني
يومي راح في الزحمة يا بيه.. البلد بتعذبني

english.title: why did it become so dark*
text: From the morning I am drowning in troubles
And from the start, the day is going so wrong
I have to wait for his majesty to pass
while he shamelessly drives in the wrong direction on a one way street.*
why is my heart so troubled
Looks like it will be a day that I am going to regret living.
Why am i stuck in this terrible traffic jam, I should have never come this way
My whole day is wasted in this traffic, this country is killing m!
I wanted to take a right, but they advised me that it would be better if i took a left
I said, well they must know what they are talking about
but i ended up in a cemetery
If you ask for directions in this country*
Why am i stuck in this terrible traffic jam, I should have never come this way
I just managed to pass the bus,
Only to look near me and see a wedding car convoy*
You have no choice but to go where the car convoy is going
Very loud music is blaring, and no one seems to notice
the bitterness we are living in
Why am i stuck in this terrible traffic jam, I should have never come this way
My whole day is wasted in this traffic, this country is killing m!
Once I thought i was smarter than everyone else
so I took a short cut that was supposed to get me away from the traffic. I was so happy about it
Only to find myself stuck in a more crowded street downtown
So I pulled over a started weeping
Woe to me and my life!
Am I ever going to get home today??!!
Why am i stuck in this terrible traffic jam, I should have never come this way
My whole day is wasted in this traffic, this country is killing me!
I almost got home when I found the street I live on blocked off
There was this big crowd, and the house was surrounded by the police
I then noticed a scraggly-looking young man
That the crowd was carrying, an activist, they say
come on, forget about going home, the day is ruined already
how could it get any worse
Why am i stuck in this terrible traffic jam, I should have never come this way
My whole day is wasted in this traffic, this country is killing me!

arabic.title: عصفورين
text: مشهد جميل شوفته ياما في الصباح
عصفورين بيلقطوا ورق الشجر وبيبنوا عش
شئ مؤكد مكنش في بينهم خداع ومكنش غش
لو مبني طوب أو مبني قش
أنا من غربة لغربة و أنا مرمي يا دنيا
عصفورين بيلقطوا ورق الشجر وبيبنوا عش
شئ مؤكد مكنش في بينهم خداع ومكنش غش
الوطن راحة القلوب لو مبني طوب أو مبني قش

english.title: Two Birds
text: When the birds fold the wings
Near the beaches to have rest
And colored the feathers with wounds
The may be afraid of space
Beautiful scenery, I saw it in the morning
Two birds are picking leaves and building  a nest
It is certain there was no deception and cheating among them
If it is a brick building or a straw building
From a strange country to another and I am  thrown o world
And in every throw I' m broken
And My life says "You have just one second"
I'll wait to make my dream come true
Two birds are picking leaves and building  a nest
It is certain there was no deception and cheating among them
If it is a brick building or a straw building

english.title: On the path (door)of God
text: and carry no vengeance ,even when they do carry
let go of those who spoke against you ,it is no bother
I am not angry at whoever spoke
if  one day some one  hurt me
with a word I do not hurt him back
he did not mean it do not  do him injustice
what have you achieved with blame
if our hearts can  carry so much

arabic.title: كن عوناً
text: لو يشكو القلبُ هموماً قد باتت فيه
ما أجمله قلبٌ يحمل هم أخيه

english.title: Be Helpful
text: If a heart is moaning from sorrow
A Child's smile will wipe it all away
And condoles him in his hard times
Generations dream of the development of their countries
Youth who carry the hope for all human beings
We work for the glory to improve ourselves
And to strengthen the relations between society members

english.title: Don't Cry
text: It ends like a dream by the dawn
And soon you will grow, my boy
You'll want to cry, but you won't
If the rain stayed up with us
Or if the cold covered our streets
The warmness lives in our bones
The fire of the earth runs through us
And it will rise from the rage of the poor
Don't you cry, no, my boy
Don't you cry, no, my boy
I might be held behind walls
And you will miss my love and tenderness
Then look at your heart, you will find me
The cuffs aren't strong as the ideas
And I was hidden away from you
Don't let your trees be watered by your tears
Don't you cry, no, my boy
Don't you cry, no, my boy
I will hold you, with a wound in my chest
And I'll love, with my wounded heart
Don't you cry, no, my boy

english.title: What are fates doing?
text: What are my fates doing to me?
having a severe wound deep inside
I've been always saying "It's all for good
I was walking, caring about nothing
No matter what will happen to me
I was walking, minding only my own
Why did you gave me your hands?
What are my fates doing to me?
Will you be treacherous or trustee?
May that night have a dawn?
I was lonely in my path
Why did you open your hearts?
What are my fates doing to me?

english.title: Assistance!
text: O Allah, send blessings on our master
Muhammad, the noblest of Allah's creations
O Allah, send blessings on our master
My love, O Messenger of Allah
You who have been sent amongst us
O illiterate one who taught others,
and the start of the story.
You are to me my leader
My heart by you was guided.

english.title: Farewell
text: "What a shame!" a hundred times over
being harsh doesn't mean you're smart.
If there’s any mercy in this world
I feel too sorry for myself
I am not able to leave you all and depart.
and the bygone years of my life.
Suddenly, because of you, O world!
Have all gone with the wind
We've been fooled by this world for such a long time,
This is a strange world that is keeping us far apart.
I see a tear in your eyes
I carry some it in my own eyes;
I cannot bear to see you
And none of you can bring himself
to come and bid me farewell.
The nights may keep us apart
but you are always on my mind;
This world brings us together once,
But separates us a hundred times.
We've been fooled by this world for such a long time,
This is a strange world that is keeping us far apart.
A path that no one knows where it will lead us
yet we have no choice but to follow it;
I’ve suffered so much in you, O world!
Out of my anguish I cursed you,
You took was due to you, but what was due to me
I have left it until the Day of Judgment.
We've been fooled by this world for such a long time,
This is a strange world that is keeping us far apart.
We've been fooled by this world for such a long time,
This is a strange world that is keeping us far apart.

english.title: Flying Again
text: My heart was lost that day
And all my fears went away
Told me: You still have me by your side
My head is up in the cloud
Your touch gave me that strength
And just because you are with me
My soul has return to me
I can't believe my own eyes
My head up in the cloud
Your touch gave me that strength

arabic.title: هنسى
text: ده اللي يعيش ياما وياما يشوف
هفرح دي الفرحة بجد لسه وحشاني
فيها إيه لو تبقى لحظة حلوة وخداني
اللي راح ده كان لازم ما يجيش
هفرح دي الفرحة بجد لسه وحشاني
فيها إيه لو تبقى لحظة حلوة وخداني
هفرح دي الفرحة بجد لسه وحشاني
فيها إيه لو تبقى لحظة حلوة وخداني

english.title: I will forget
text: days- some are good, some are hard.
Years after years keep passing on
Who lives more, sees more n' more2.
I will forget all my sorrows
will rejoice. I really still miss joy.
What's wrong in being overwhelmed by a tremendous moment
Oh, my life, turn back to be calm again for me.
What missed you wasn't meant for you in the first place.
Life after all doesn't worth you
And for what should I be sad?
Who does choose hell4 with his free will?
Has it ever been good for me
I will forget all my sorrows
will rejoice. I really still miss joy.
What's wrong in being overwhelmed by a tremendous moment
Oh, my life, turn back to be calm again for me.
I will forget all my sorrows
will rejoice. I really still miss joy.
What's wrong in being overwhelmed by a tremendous moment
Oh, my life, turn back to be calm again for me.

english.title: I'll forget
text: Oh, my heart. Under any circumstances
be happy. I'm really missing the joy.
What's wrong in being taken away by a beautiful moment?
Oh, Life! Become clear to me!
What you missed wasn't meant to come anyway.
Who would choose the hell by his own free will?
be happy. I'm really missing the joy.
What's wrong in being taken away by a beautiful moment?
Oh, Life! Become clear to me!
It's out of our hands what we are going to face.
But you, Life! No matter how stubborn you are
or even (how much you're) challenging me
be happy. I'm really missing the joy.
What's wrong in being taken away by a beautiful moment?
Oh, Life! Become clear to me!

english.title: Come down O Rain!
text: A dream - just like a rose - grows
And the crescent becomes a full moon
Enter the huts and shanty towns
And water the flowers of anger
That the one who is going to wipe them has arrived
Drop by drop on the paths
And do not fear the clouds O free land
Good times always follow the bad ones
Embrace me and quench my thirst
And cover with your scarf my companion
No matter how many times I fall

arabic.title: ولا صحبة أحلى
text: ولا صُحبة أحلى من تجلّي الذات
ولا حضن أدفى من ونس في النفس
نور لي كل اللي طفاه الأمس
أنا وحدي جايز بس منّي كتير
فيه شوك في روحنا ألمه فاق الحد
يا صبح جاي يصحّي في عيوننا
هنعدّي يومنا لو يا دوب ع القدّ
ولا صحبة أحلى من تجلّي الذات
ولا صحبة أحلى من تجلّي الذات
ولا حضن أدفى من ونس في النفس

english.title: No company is sweeter than
text: No company is sweeter than of one's soul
The warmest embrace comes from within
I maybe alone but I have the strenght of self
Taking me as far as I wish to reach
I see the moonlight quivering at my doorstep
Lighting up my way and all that I lost
I may feel lonely But I'm not alone in this
We all long to be loved
We may be separated by the seas
Trying to mend our sorrow and grief
But the pain is just unbearable
The light of dusk shines through
Calling us to rise, yet we can barely make it
For loneliness can be one's best company
Echoing our voices back to us
We're calling out, but who's there to listen
For no company is sweeter than that of one's soul
For no company is sweeter than that of one's soul
The warmest embrace comes from within

arabic.title: يا ديرتي
text: لولا الشقا ما تطول عنك غيبتي
لولا الشقا ما تطول عنك غيبتي
لولا الشقا ما تطول عنك غيبتي
لولا الشقا ما تطول عنك غيبتي
لولا الشقا ما تطول عنك غيبتي
لولا الشقا ما تطول عنك غيبتي

english.title: Ya dirti- oh my home town
text: If it weren't for the hardships, I wouldn't have
Leaving you is not a choice
If it weren't for the bad time,
If it weren't for the hardships, I wouldn't have
It will not be one time
I had it up to here
I am not a prophet, what can I do?
If it weren't for the hardships, I wouldn't have been away for long)
What can I do to my fate
I shall go on the seas
When I get close to death
My heart broke, be a guard
,oh my homeland, for my little girl
If it weren't for the hardships, I wouldn't have been away for long) ×3

english.title: Oh bird
text: oh bird which is captured, imprisoned
to grow in the heart of a freeman
you may not be a leader
but there are millions behind you
and you became like the tree

english.title: How lucky he is !
text: Who said that we have an old-fashioned educational system ?
No, we are quite good, I swear.
and has model answers with no need to memorize !
How lucky he is, who is going to be EDUCATED with us !
is taking a week off. Enjoy, kids !
How lucky he is, who is going to be EDUCATED with us !
A fascinating uniforms. Looks like curtains
How lucky he is, who is going to be EDUCATED with us !
Your success is guaranteed if you are in science class."**
How lucky he is, who is going to be EDUCATED with us !
It's claimed that educational process in Europe goes focused in a right way.
Excuse me, But we are the origin, and we are more modern !
Can't you see the classes, with ceramic-decorated floors
How lucky he is, who is going to be EDUCATED with us !
And all are brothers during the exams.
Question in exchange for another, it's a give and take !
How lucky he is, who is going to be EDUCATED with us !
The dean, What a kind man !
That's why he is so beloved.
How lucky he is, who is going to be EDUCATED with us !
Your fate is the same, despite your grade (no matter what)
God willing, you will be a sales man.
How lucky he is, who is going to be EDUCATED with us !
Every thing is good, I'm feeling optimist.
Here you will discover a very high standards.
If you saw a naive blindly lead to us by his very own steps,
It's is just his bad destiny, let him face it !
How lucky he is, who is going to be EDUCATED with us !
How lucky he is, who is going to be EDUCATED with us !

english.title: Branches of the pomegranate tree tangled over me
text: When branches of the pomegranate tree tangled over me,
The lemon tree came to rescue.1
I don't want (to be with) this handsome man.
Just take me (back) to my people.*
When branches of the pomegranate tree tangled over me,
The lemon tree came to rescue.
I don't want this handsome man.
Just take me to my people.
When branches of the pomegranate tree tangled over me,
The lemon tree came to rescue.
I don't want this handsome man.
Just take me to my people.
I will do what I want to do
There is no escape from this.**
When branches of the pomegranate tree tangled over me,
The lemon tree came to rescue.
I don't want this handsome man.
Just take me to my people.
Go to the shrine of (Musa al-Kadhim)3
There at the master of all masters4
You shall take off your grief.***
When branches of the pomegranate tree tangled over me,
The lemon tree came to rescue.
I don't want this handsome man.
Just take me to my people.
When branches of the pomegranate tree tangled over me,
The lemon tree came to rescue.
I don't want this handsome man.
Just take me to my people.

english.title: Build Your Palaces
text: That's our hard work and what's ours
Let your hounds roam the streets
Now we know who is hurting us
We are steeping into a one way road
And we can see the victory

english.title: Erect Your Palaces
text: Erect your palaces on the farmland
Out of our toil and handiwork
And the bars1 are next to the factories
And the prison is next to the garden
And set your dogs loose in the streets
And lock us in your cells
Our sleep has declined in our beds
As much as we slept,2, we didn't want to
And be heavy-handed in your abuse
We've been abused and had enough of it
And we know who's to blame for our wounds
And we know our spirit and we've met it3
Workers and country folk and students
Our clock rang and we began
And victory is imminent in our eyes

arabic.title: هتجن يا ريت
text: ولا لب أسمر و سوداني و حمص
قال ايه جوز خالة ام أحمد
و الله الموت ده مفيد و لذيذ
ولا عركة في نص الليل دايرة بالحيل
و شه معور قال ده عريس

english.title: I'm Going Crazy, I wish that...
text: I am going crazy, folks, I wish that
I had never gone to London nor Paris
These are lands of civilization and cleanliness
And it all frankly makes me seethe
I didn't find there a great big bully
all around and peeling some lettuce
Nor did I see a humongous guy dragging another
while holding a pole of sugar cane
Nor was there pumpkin seeds, peanuts and chickpeas
And people littering the streets eating them
I am going crazy, folks, I wish that
I had never gone to London nor Paris
These are lands of civilization and cleanliness
And it all frankly makes me seethe
filling the air with screams and weeping
Turns out the husband of the aunt of Om Ahmad
(who is the in-law of her brother, El Sayed) died...
Praise the Lord for He is so mighty...
I swear death is so useful and nice
There was no fight going on forever in the middle of the night
And people being dragged by the cops
With a guy getting pushed around
who has a scarred face, and turns out he's the groom
So why is it that we must be the idiots?
I am going crazy, folks, I wish that
I had never gone to London nor Paris
These are lands of civilization and cleanliness
And it all frankly makes me seethe
Nor did I find a no-lifer running
And telling him: Ha! I caught you,
You son of a God knows what...
The street is not a field for animals folks
Nor did I find a guy running
And telling him: Ha! I caught you,
You son of a God knows what...
The street is not a field for animals folks
Nor did I find someone selling something
that he says costs a pound but ends up selling for a cent
is a massive hassle and a headache
Nor was there a hundred thousand Upper Egyptians
marching like an army nor was there
a thousand guys stamping their feet
and coming with their shoe polish kits
I swear I now hate street cafes
and I'll never chill in the outdoors anymore
Nor did I see someone with a traditional scarf,
another with a turban and another with a fez
Folks, our clothes are a collection
the people who wear them are countless
We used to be better than all these people
we will become better than them too
I swear it's a shame that we learn lessons
